value:
$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|Winter envoy? Me? Who ever would
have thought? I suppose my caroling
voice is the best in Askr...but still!$k$pI'd rather be inside on a candlelit
date than trudging through the snow
delivering gifts.$k$pI know, I know. "Manuela, you should
be selfless this time of year." But
I deserve to unwrap my true love!$k$pSpeaking of, I better change out of
this outfit before anyone—wait,
what's that girl doing out in the cold?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|How in the world did you fall asleep?
It's freezing out here! Come on, get
up! Before you get sick.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Huh? Oh, was I asleep again? The
snow is just so soft and fluffy...$k$p*yawn* What time is it? I'm supposed
to finish delivering all these presents.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|"Finish" delivering? Judging by the
number of presents in your bag, you
haven't even started.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Really? I guess I must have dreamed
it. *yawn* It was such a good dream...
Everyone loved their gifts.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|And here I thought I was the envoy
with the least motivation.$k$pPeople can't love their presents if
they never actually receive them,
you know?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|You're right. There's still time, but
we have to hurry... *yawn*$k$pActually, can we get hot cocoa first?
Or just a quick nap... Zzz...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|Wait a minute, you can't fall asleep
again! Get up! Up! And she's out cold.$k$p*sigh* You clearly can't do this
alone. I guess I'll have to help. Come
on, let's go! My toes are freezing.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Hwah? Oh, you'll help? I knew you
would! See? You're a good person
after all.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_FF_Pair,Face|Why, it's Professor Manuela. You're
clearly in the festive spirit. Unless all
those gifts are for yourself?$k$p$nMPID_ルーテ|By my calculation, distributing that
many presents before nightfall would
require...well, a festival miracle.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|You think I don't know that? If a
certain someone hadn't slept the
day away, we'd—$k$pHonestly, Mirabilis! Do you really
think they'll offer to help us if you
keep falling asleep?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|Huh? No, they aren't falling sheep...
They're jumping! Eighty-five,
eighty-six...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭マヌエラ,ch17_30_Manuela_F_Winter21,Face|Pick up the pace, Mirabilis! The
clock is ticking and these gifts
aren't going to deliver themselves!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Winter21,Face|*yawn* OK, OK, I'm hurrying...$k$p$Sbs150|
